familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received None (or less than $201) in (income type not disclosed) income from KUSHNER CREDIT OPPORTUNITY FUND, LLC (Management Company; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. This asset has a loan receivable from KCOF - 215 Moore LLC.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Managing Member of Kushner Credit Opportunity Fund, LLC from Dec 1, 2016, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received None (or less than $201) in (income type not disclosed) income from KUSHNER CREDIT OPPORTUNITY FUND, LLC (Management Company; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because there is no indication his interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest. This asset has a loan receivable from KCOF - 215 Moore LLC.
